message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Let's meet in the middle!
You started low, I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up much!
You're giving up more, I'm gaining more. It's time to think about the future!
You're pushing me to the limit, but I'm not backing down. Meet me at 55/45!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy. It's time to think about the future!
I'm not giving up! I'll take 70% of the remaining value, and I'll make it worth your while!
You're getting aggressive, I'm getting cautious. This is my last chance to take control!
This is my last chance. I'll take 90% of the remaining value, and I'm willing to walk away if you don't accept!
You're bluffing, I'm calling. This is my last stand!
I'll give you 90% of what's left. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing.
